subHistory: In case you cannot cancel your order online or want to change it, please contact AliBus at 1900 868024.

noResult_2: If you can be flexible, refer to other buses on other days
cancellationPolicyTxt: Cancellation fee is calculated on original price, excluding discount and not exceeding your paid amount.
onboardingTxt1: Show up 30 minutes at the office/ticket counter/bus station before for check in
onboardingTxt3: Do not bring food, smelly food to the bus
onboardingTxt4: Do not smoke, drink alcohol or use drugs on the bus
onboardingTxt5: Do not bring flammable objects to the vehicle
onboardingTxt6: Do not litter in the bus
onboardingTxt7: Do not make noise in the bus
onboardingTxt8: Take off shoes or sandals before boarding
handBaggageTxt1: The total weight of hand baggage item(s) must not exceed 15 kgs
handBaggageTxt3: No refund in case of cancellation due to violation of baggage regulations
CPPTxt1: Pregnant women need to ensure health during the trip
CPPTxt2: The operator has the right to cancel tickets if passengers do not comply with the regulations on children and pregnant women
CPPTxt3: Children under the age of 8 are allowed to share seat/bed with their parents
CPPTxt4: Children from the age of 10 have to buy ticket as adult
pickUpDropOffTxt: The pick-up point and drop-off point times below are the estimated times. This schedule may vary depending on the actual situation.
amenitiesTxt2: Bus Company's Staffs can speak English
amenitiesTxt4: Massage features on chairs make a journey as comfortable, relaxing and stress-relieving as possible for customers.
amenitiesTxt6: Bus Company have equipted seatbelt for each seats on bus
amenitiesTxt8: Bus Companies disinfected buses to protect customer with the best possible
amenitiesTxt10: Always equipped hand sanitizier before & after boarding the bus
amenitiesTxt12: High recommend to obliged customers wear face mask
amenitiesTxt14: Customers will served water on bus.
amenitiesTxt16: Bus Company have equipted emergency hammer on bus to escape when needed.
choosePlaceTxt1: We make sure you’ll get the seat you selected.
